Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Tankkor served as the means of transportation in the Antartica 
country. With such freezing cold, and mass of snow, his vhicle mode was the 
only thing able to plow through it. So that ment the ambush team was forced 
to ride on him in the form. With his numerous headlights full blast, they 
went deeper into the snow storm. 
       "They should be a mile or so this way. Our ambush is going to at least 
seperate them and damage them so they will be forced to turn around. Is that 
clear?" The leader of the ambush said, through jagged teeth in a depp gravely 
voice. He gave them the mission parameters, and now they knew what was to be 
done.
       The tank pressed onward, with the team on its back. He didnt like 
being the mode of transportation, but with his turret ready to fire, he was 
happy to at least be able to get the first shots off.
       Rampage looked to Inferno, who looked to Paralysis. The four members 
were the best armed, and the most experienced. Guns ready, ammo loaded, the 
sense of battle aroused, they came closer to Killfests strike team, so close 
they began to smell the different bots ahead of them.

       The ice cave that served as Megatrons headquarters was truly a great 
location. Sitting on top of a mountian of ice, it was almost impenetrable. A 
double sold iron door was the only portal into the facility, which was good 
beacuse Megatron didnt like unexpected vistors coming through back doors. And 
another plus was the fact that thier was no need for air vents, no need for 
the cold air. 
       Flanking the outside of the iron door were two modified turret 
autoguns. Modified because thier were only two. Given the fact that the trail 
to the door was small, and between two carved ice walls, space was limited 
and the two guns would be adequate to eliminate any intruders because thier 
was no place to go except back or forward. Besides the basic, there were 
basic shields which surrounded the area around the trail to the cave. Trying 
to dig in would be suicide considering the avalanch that would occur. 
       "Tarantulas, how are the defences?" Megatron said, he sitting in the 
command chair and Tarantulas sitting at the main terminal.
       He responded, "Shields are armed, Autoguns are ready and working, and 
the doors are magnetically sealed until we hear from the ambush team. 
According to the map, they should be right on top of them as we speak."

--part1_aa.e4181ef.27681130_boundary
